mapper.select: select va.variable_key as 'variableKey', va.variable_value as 'variableValue' from wj_mobile_variable_info va where va.valid = 'YES' and va.variable_version > #{variableVersion} order by va.update_date, va.id
select va.variable_version as 'variableVersion' from wj_mobile_variable_info va where va.valid = 'YES' order by va.variable_version desc limit 0,1
